languages.text: "Шерин... Я уже говорила, что вы свят{mf|ой|ая}? Ибо не вижу других причин для проявления столь отчаянного, но бессмысленного терпения. Может, все же поторопим события?"

traits.locale_text: "Шерин... Я уже говорила, что вы свят{mf|ой|ая}? Ибо не вижу других причин для проявления столь отчаянного, но бессмысленного терпения. Может, все же поторопим события?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"
languages.original_text: "Шерин... Я уже говорила, что вы свят{mf|ой|ая}? Ибо не вижу других причин для проявления столь отчаянного, но бессмысленного терпения. Может, все же поторопим события?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的……你真是个圣人，我以前有没有这么说过？你绝对是个圣人，因为你的耐心是如此热忱，又是如此毫无意义，我根本看不出来你为什么要这么做。我们就不能抓紧时间吗？”
languages.original_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的……你真是个圣人，我以前有没有这么说过？你绝对是个圣人，因为你的耐心是如此热忱，又是如此毫无意义，我根本看不出来你为什么要这么做。我们就不能抓紧时间吗？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Shereen... Es usted un{mf||a} sant{mf|o|a}, ¿se lo he dicho ya? Tiene que serlo, porque no veo otro motivo por el que demostrar una paciencia tan ferviente e innecesaria. ¿No podemos acelerar las cosas?».
languages.original_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"

traits.locale_text: «Shereen... Es usted un{mf||a} sant{mf|o|a}, ¿se lo he dicho ya? Tiene que serlo, porque no veo otro motivo por el que demostrar una paciencia tan ferviente e innecesaria. ¿No podemos acelerar las cosas?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン…あんたは聖人なのかしら？前にも言ったけれど。間違いないわね、こんなに熱心に無駄な忍耐を見せてくれる理由が他に見当たらないわ。早く事を進められたりはしないのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン…あんたは聖人なのかしら？前にも言ったけれど。間違いないわね、こんなに熱心に無駄な忍耐を見せてくれる理由が他に見当たらないわ。早く事を進められたりはしないのかしら？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Shereen... On vous a déjà dit que vous étiez {mf|un saint|une sainte} ? Je ne vois pas d'autre explication à la patience aussi fervente qu'insensée dont vous faites preuve dans les circonstances actuelles. Que diriez-vous d'accélérer un peu les choses, plutôt ? »
languages.original_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen... On vous a déjà dit que vous étiez {mf|un saint|une sainte} ? Je ne vois pas d'autre explication à la patience aussi fervente qu'insensée dont vous faites preuve dans les circonstances actuelles. Que diriez-vous d'accélérer un peu les choses, plutôt ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen ... Ihr seid {mf|ein Heiliger|eine Heilige}, habe ich Euch das schon gesagt? Einen anderen Grund gibt es nämlich nicht, warum Ihr so unerschütterlich und grundlos geduldig sein solltet. Können wir die Sache nicht ein wenig beschleunigen?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen ... Ihr seid {mf|ein Heiliger|eine Heilige}, habe ich Euch das schon gesagt? Einen anderen Grund gibt es nämlich nicht, warum Ihr so unerschütterlich und grundlos geduldig sein solltet. Können wir die Sache nicht ein wenig beschleunigen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim... Sende {mf|aziz|azize} sabrı var, bunu sana daha önce söylemiş miydim? Muhakkak var, yoksa nasıl böylesine hararetli fakat bir o kadar da anlamsız bir şekilde sabredesin? Biraz acele etsek olmaz mı?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen... You're a saint, have I told you that before? You must be, because I don't see any other reason why you would show such fervent but senseless patience. Can't we hurry things along?"

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim... Sende {mf|aziz|azize} sabrı var, bunu sana daha önce söylemiş miydim? Muhakkak var, yoksa nasıl böylesine hararetli fakat bir o kadar da anlamsız bir şekilde sabredesin? Biraz acele etsek olmaz mı?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
